commands.forge.gen.complete: {2} 차원에 대한 {0}개의 ({1}을 제외한) 새로운 청크 생성 완료.

commands.forge.tags.copy_tag_names: Click to copy all tag names to clipboard
commands.forge.tags.copy_element_names: Click to copy all element names to clipboard
forge.update.beta.2: 심각한 문제가 발생한다면, 먼저 신고하기 전 문제를 확인하세요.
forge.menu.updatescreen.title: 모드 업데이트
forge.configgui.removeErroringEntities.t: Set this to true to remove any Entity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
forge.configgui.removeErroringBlockEntit: Set this to true to remove any BlockEntity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
forge.configgui.fullBoundingBoxLadders.t: Set this to true to check the entire entity's collision bounding box for ladders instead of just the block they are in. Causes noticeable differences in mechanics so default is vanilla behavior. Default: false.
forge.configgui.zombieBaseSummonChance.t: 좀비 생성 확률의 기본값을 설정합니다. 보너스 좀비 생성 기능 바꾸기를 허용합니다.
forge.configgui.zombieBabyChance.tooltip: 좀비(혹은 그 하위 종류)가 아기가 될 확률을 설정합니다. 좀비 생성 기능 바꾸기를 허용합니다.
forge.configgui.logCascadingWorldGenerat: Log cascading chunk generation issues during terrain population.
forge.configgui.fixVanillaCascading.tool: Fix vanilla issues that cause worldgen cascading. This DOES change vanilla worldgen so DO NOT report bugs related to world differences if this flag is on.
forge.configgui.dimensionUnloadQueueDela: 서버가 차원을 언로드할 때 기다릴 틱 단위 시간입니다. 빠르게 차원을 불러오고 언로드할 때 유용합니다. 예를 들어 네더 차원문에 초당 여러 번씩 아이템을 던질 때 등입니다.
forge.configgui.clumpingThreshold.toolti: Controls the number threshold at which Packet51 is preferred over Packet52, default and minimum 64, maximum 1024.
forge.configgui.treatEmptyTagsAsAir.tool: Vanilla will treat crafting recipes using empty tags as air, and allow you to craft with nothing in that slot. This changes empty tags to use BARRIER as the item. To prevent crafting with air.
Skip checking if an ingredient is empty during shapeless recipe deserialization to prevent complex ingredients from caching tags too early.
forge.configgui.skipEmptyShapelessCheck: Skip checking for empty ingredients in Shapeless Recipe Deserialization
forge.configgui.forceSystemNanoTime.tool: Force the use of System.nanoTime instead of glfwGetTime as the main client Time provider.
forge.configgui.zoomInMissingModelTextIn: Toggle off to make missing model text in the gui fit inside the slot.
forge.configgui.forgeCloudsEnabled.toolt: GPU에 더 빠른 렌더링을 위해 기하학적 구름 요소를 업로드 할 수 있도록 활성화합니다.
Disable culling of hidden faces next to stairs and slabs. Causes extra rendering, but may fix some resource packs that exploit this vanilla mechanic.
forge.configgui.alwaysSetupTerrainOffThr:
Enable Forge to queue all chunk updates to the Chunk Update thread.
May increase FPS significantly, but may also cause weird rendering lag.
Not recommended for computers without a significant number of cores available.
forge.configgui.forgeLightPipelineEnable: Enable the Forge block rendering pipeline - fixes the lighting of custom models.
forge.configgui.selectiveResourceReloadE: When enabled, makes specific reload tasks such as language changing quicker to run.
forge.configgui.showLoadWarnings.tooltip: 활성화되었을 때, Forge는 불러오는 동안 여러 경고 메세지를 띄울 수 있습니다.
forge.configgui.disableVersionCheck.tool: Forge의 버전 확인 기능을 끄려면 참으로 설정하세요. Forge는 버전 정보를 받기 위해 저희 서버에 있는 작은 json 형식의 파일을 질의합니다. 더 자세한 정보를 원하신다면 저희 github에서 ForgeVersion 클래스를 보시기 바랍니다.
forge.experimentalsettings.tooltip: This world uses experimental settings, which could stop working at any time.
forge.selectWorld.backupWarning.experime: This message will not show again for this world.
